author: 愛
text: It’s rare, but some people feels like a safe home.

author: 愛
text: 11 months ago I started to see the numbers 47 and 74, everywhere. I went crazy trying to figure out why. But my intuitions say, and I believe it, that these are my guide numbers. My life got so much better. When I see those numbers, I know, in my gut, that I am on the right path.

author: 愛
text: Our ego can turn the wonderful and magic experience of love a bit difficult sometimes. But I choose to love anyway, always.

author: 愛
text: The problem is that our ego gets in the way.

author: 愛
text: Love is a feeling, not an agreement, so is actually the opposite of commitment. Pure love is free. https://t.co/qsHcOemfan

author: 愛
text: Memories are alterable. You can revise your bad memories and change them for better ones. This will help you to break bad circles, improvise your self-concept and attract better things into your life. ✨😚

author: 愛
text: So, I would say to learn how to think with your head but also with your heart. They are both useful.

author: 愛
text: Now I am so happy to realize that the best kind of love is our own and that means drawing some boundaries with “bad phases people”, but it doesn't necessarily mean to stop loving them.

author: 愛
text: Bad actions towards us, don't necessarily make a person bad. Since we live by phases, I like to give the benefit of the doubt and always believed that love is medicine and this belief made me go all in several times. It was terrible for me but it was also my choice, not theirs.

author: 愛
text:
But I question people who say “you should love the ones who love you” (or this kind of sentences).
We cannot choose who we love... And when we purely love someone, we don't love the person because of the things they give us. If so, it's not unconditional love...it's not pure.

author: 愛
text: Once I love someone, I find it extremely hard to “unlove” them. Even the ones who hurt me, I always understood why they did it, plus, I love them for what they are or were, not for what they gave me… So I love lots of people, even the ones I don’t see or talked to in a long time

author: 愛
text: The beauty of human being is that we are always evolving. Change is the only constant in life.

author: 愛
text: When we connect with a new version of ourselves, we have to stop thinking about the old one. Also, we need to drop our pride and ego and give the other people the opportunity to show up as the new versions of themselves too.

author: 愛
text: I don’t remember feeling this much light in me. Feeling so blessed, so connected, so awake, so in love for me and all things in life, so centred, so calm and peaceful... I just wish this feeling to every human being and believe me it's so much easier than we think!!! 💗✨
